Event 2026

Supporting Ukraine: Vehicles for Medical and Volunteer Units

The Canadian Association of the New Ukrainian Generation (CANUG) is organizing a charity event in 2026 with the goal of raising funds to purchase vehicles and deliver them to Ukraine. The funds raised will be used to support medical units, military volunteers, and volunteer organizations that operate in challenging and demanding conditions.

Event Purpose

The primary purpose of the event donation part is to raise funds for:

  • purchasing vehicles;
  • preparing vehicles for operation in difficult conditions;
  • transportation and delivery of vehicles to Ukraine.

The vehicles will be used to support:

  • medical evacuation and emergency response;
  • transportation of medical personnel and equipment;
  • volunteer and humanitarian operations in high-risk and hard-to-access areas.

Why This Matters

Reliable transportation is critical in wartime conditions for:

  • saving lives;
  • providing timely medical assistance;
  • ensuring mobility of medical teams and volunteers;
  • supporting operations in frontline and remote areas.

Providing vehicles significantly improves the effectiveness and safety of medical and volunteer units working under extreme conditions.

Event Format

The event will be held in a community and cultural format and will include:

  • live performances;
  • exhibitions;
  • community gathering and discussion;
  • charitable fundraising activities.

The event is open to all who wish to support humanitarian initiatives and assistance to Ukraine.

Use of Funds

All funds raised will be used exclusively for the stated non-profit purposes, including:

  • vehicle acquisition;
  • logistics and delivery costs;
  • ensuring proper and intended use of the vehicles.

The organization operates with transparency and accountability.

Organizer

The event is organized by the Canadian Association of the New Ukrainian Generation (CANUG), a non-profit organization registered in British Columbia, Canada.

How to Support

You can support this initiative by:

  • attending the event;
  • making a donation;
  • sharing information about the event;
  • becoming a partner or sponsor.

Important Notice

The Organization provides humanitarian and volunteer support only. This fundraising initiative is intended for transportation support for medical and volunteer units and does not involve participation in combat activities.
